Description: Storage Engineer – INJob SummaryConfigure and manage storage arrays, switches, and fabrics, including EMC PMAX/VMAX/AFA, Unity, VNX, Power Store, NetApp (FAS,AFF), and Brocade switches, Unity, FAS arrays, as well as Flex Clone, Snap Mirror and  Snap VaultRecognize client needs, then implement in accordance with product offeringsHandles medium to large customer configuration questions, complex One-Off questions, and out of scope One-Off approvals.Strong working knowledge of networking, fibre channel concepts, and technologiesDesired qualificationsKey ResponsibilitiesJob ComplexityKnowledgeEducationExperience RequiredJob Details
